meanings.sent1: The coalbins in the basement were filled to the brim with black coal.
meanings.sent2: The workers loaded the coalbins onto the truck for delivery.

meanings.sent5: The coalbins loomed large in the dimly lit storage room, ready to provide warmth in the winter.
